SEARCH
Package Client.Model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
Client.Model.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Board extends Object implements Serializable
The Board class represents the game board and contains methods for manipulating and querying the board state.
See Also:

      isSilverBottom - parameter to know if user playing as silver player

    • getPositionsOfPlayersTroops

      public ArrayList<Offset2D> getPositionsOfPlayersTroops(Player player, Player enemy, String gameMode, boolean isSilverBottom)
      Retrieves the positions of a player's troops based on the game mode.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose troop positions are to be retrieved.
      enemy - The enemy player.
      gameMode - The game mode ("SWITCH", "STEP", "PULL", "PUSH").
      isSilverBottom - parameter to know if user playing as silver player
      Returns:
      A list of positions of the player's troops.

      Populates the board from a 2D string array representation.
      Parameters:
      board2DString - The 2D string array representation of the board.
      player1 - The first player.
      player2 - The second player.

      Populates the board from a 2D string array representation but rotated on 180 degrees.
      Parameters:
      board2DString - The 2D string array representation of the board.
      player1 - The first player.
      player2 - The second player.

    • copyBoard

      public String[][] copyBoard()
      Creates a copy of the board.
      Returns:
